definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Peope not only need the life necessities,but also comfortable life.
sentences.chinese: 人們不僅需要生活必需品，還想生活得舒適。

sentences.english: Miss Jin and I returned to our bedroom to take some sleeping necessities.
sentences.chinese: 於是我和靳兄一起回寢室拿一些露宿必需品。

sentences.english: They had few essential supplies, to begin with, so they had to improvise.
sentences.chinese: 開始時他們沒有多少生活必需品，所以只好東拼西湊。

sentences.english: Food , drink, and air-these are the daily necessities that no one can do without.
sentences.chinese: 食物，水和空氣這些都是沒有人可以分開的必需品。

sentences.english: food , drink, and air-these are the daily necessities that no one can do without.
sentences.chinese: 食物，水和空氣這些都是沒有人可以離開的必需品。

sentences.english: People do not only need necessities, but also comfortableness.
sentences.chinese: 人們不僅需要生活必需品，還想生活得舒適。

sentences.english: To prepare all necessary accompaniments to go with order.
sentences.chinese: 根據要求準備所有的必需品。
他甚至必需品也要儉省。

sentences.english: A car is absolutely a necessity in canada because it's so sprawling.
sentences.chinese: 由於加拿大如此地廣，汽車絕對是必需品。

sentences.english: At the same time all necessaries were dear, and there was no money.
sentences.chinese: 在同一時間所有必需品了親愛的，沒有錢。

sentences.english: Chili, pepper and shallot are usually necessaries in this division.
sentences.chinese: 辣椒，辣椒和蔥，通常在這個司必需品。

sentences.english: Both bread and butter are the necessaries of life.
sentences.chinese: 麪包和奶油兩者都是生活的必需品。

sentences.english: To Polly, clothes are basic necessities.
sentences.chinese: 對Polly，衣服是生活的必需品。
接下來的必需品是食物。

sentences.english: Basic necessities are often at a premium during a war.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭時期，基本生活必需品常常奇缺。

sentences.english: Water and hygiene needs are becoming “precarious,” according to UNHCR.
sentences.chinese: 難民署還說，飲水和衛生必需品正供應不足。

definition: see 必不可少[bi4 bu4 ke3 shao3]
clothing, food, housing and transport (idiom); people's basic needs
